key.name: show-notifications
key.summary: Show notifications in the lock screen
key.description:
Whether notifications are shown in the lock screen or not. This only affects the standard experience.
DEPRECATED: This key is deprecated and ignored. It has been superseded by com.canonical.unity.desktop.notifications show-in-lock-screen.

key.name: menus-have-icons
key.description: Whether menus may display an icon next to a menu entry.

key.name: buttons-have-icons
key.description: Whether buttons may display an icon in addition to the button text.

key.name: show-input-method-menu
key.description: Whether the context menus of entries and text views should offer to change the input method.

key.name: show-unicode-menu
key.description: Whether the context menus of entries and text views should offer to insert control characters.

key.name: automatic-mnemonics
key.summary: Only show mnemonics on when the Alt key is pressed
key.description: Whether mnemonics should be automatically shown and hidden when the user presses the Alt key.

key.name: draw-background
key.description: Have GNOME draw the desktop background.

key.name: display
key.description: This key is deprecated. Use "com.canonical.unity.desktop.peripherals.touchscreen output" instead

key.name: display
key.description: This key is deprecated. Use "com.canonical.unity.desktop.peripherals.tablet output" instead
